title: Blended 5E Learning Model Workshop for Enhancing Science Integrated Subject Teaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental science concepts and interest in educational experience
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields requiring enhanced science-integrated education design and implementation competencies. Operated in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: They can apply the 5E learning model’s phase-specific strategies to design instructional methods for science-integrated subjects.
They integrate online and offline activities to plan learner engagement strategies in blended learning environments.
They implement metacognitive strategies (learning journals, feedback routines) to promote self-directed learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
